overview: Rising pornographer Bryan Gozzling uses the latest dating technology to lure frisky young freaks to his home for raunchy, spit-slathered perversions in "Hookup Hotshot: Slime Season." The tattooed director seduces a multi-racial cast of adventurers whose idea of a perfect first date involves verbal discipline, slapping, finger banging and vicious throat fucking that leaves them dripping gooey phlegm!
title: Hookup Hotshot: Slime Season
